ADVANTAGES.TEXT_6: призу отримує "крипто кран" на нашому сайті

HOW_TO_PLAY_CF:
Player can START NEW GAME or JOIN GAME already running AVAILABLE GAMES / TOP GAMES.

START NEW GAME

- player must enter bet value and choose coin side;
- referral address is optional (will receive 2% of prize if player wins);
- game information on the left side is empty for now;
- only one game can be created by account;
- player can modify bet while waiting for opponent;
- player can add game to TOP GAMES while waiting for opponent;

JOIN GAME

- player must have respectful amount of crypto to accept the game;
- referral address is optional (will receive 2% of prize if player wins);
- neither coin side, nor bet can be changed;
- player can see game information on the left side;
-game will be automatically played after join and result view will be shown.

AVAILABLE GAMES

- general game list;
- games occurs in order of creation;
- short information is being displayed for each game;
- use LOAD MORE button to download next game portion;
- player can not see his own game.

TOP GAMES

- up to 5 games are always visible to all players in separated section;
- player can not see his own game.

PROFILE

- players can check current account’s information;
- use WITHDRAW PENDING section to withdraw pending prizes and fees.

RAFFLE

- players who played games after previous raffle launch take part in the next raffle;
- 1% of game prize will be added to the ongoing raffle prize when player withdraws the game prize;
- raffle can be started as soon as minimum participants number is reached and ongoing raffle prize exceeds 0;
- players are automatically added to raffle participants in case the game is completed;
- only game winner will be added to raffle participants in case the game was quitted or move expired.

FEE DISTRIBUTION

- fees are subtracted from game prize when player withdraws the game prize;
- 90% goes to winner;
- 2% goes to referral address;
- 2% goes to the ongoing raffle prize;
- 2% goes to partner's project game;
- 2% goes to faucet;
- 2% goes to game developers.

SUSPENDED VIEW

- spam, DDOS-like and malicious actions are to be prevented;
- player's account will be restricted from joining next game for certain period of time after previousl game is completed;
- player can use his other accounts to play.

SMART CONTRACT

- Coin Flip Smart Contract
HOW_TO_PLAY_RPS:
Player can START NEW GAME or JOIN GAME already running AVAILABLE GAMES / TOP GAMES.

START NEW GAME

- player must enter bet value, select move and enter seed phrase to hash the move. Seed phrase is to be memorized and used in next creator's move to retrieve selected move from the CREATOR'S MOVE HASH;
- referral address is optional and allows to receive 2% of prize if player wins;
- game information on the left side is empty for now;
- only one game can be created by an account;
- player can increase bet only while waiting for the opponent;
- player can add game to TOP GAMES while waiting for the opponent;

JOIN GAME

- player must have respectful amount of crypto to accept the game;
- player must select move;
- referral address is optional and allows to receive 2% of prize if player wins;
- player can see game information on the left side;

AVAILABLE GAMES

- general game list;
- newly created games will be added on top of the list;
- short information is displayed for each game;
- use LOAD MORE button to download next game portion;
- player can not see his own game.

TOP GAMES

- up to 5 games are always visible to all players in a separate section;
-- player can not see his own game.

PROFILE

- player can see current account’s information;
- use WITHDRAW PENDING section to withdraw pending prizes and bonuses.

RAFFLE

- players who played games after previous raffle launch take part in the next raffle;
- 1% of game prize will be added to the ongoing raffle prize when player withdraws the game prize;
- raffle can be started as soon as minimum participants number is reached and ongoing raffle prize exceeds 0;
- players are automatically added to raffle participants in case the game is completed;
- only game winner will be added to raffle participants in case the game was quitted or move expired.

FEE DISTRIBUTION

- fees are subtracted from game prize when player withdraws the game prize;
- 90% goes to winner;
- 2% goes to referral address;
- 2% goes to the ongoing raffle prize;
- 2% goes to partner's project game;
- 2% goes to faucet;
- 2% goes to game developers.

CREATOR'S MOVE HASH

- all data in Blockchain is public, but creator's move remains hidden until the opponent performs his move;
- hash string is created from creator's selected move and seed phrase. CREATOR'S MOVE HASH will be sent as move representation;
- game creator must reveal his previous move before performing the next move. Previous move and seed phrase are used for this.

SUSPENDED VIEW

- spam, DDOS-like and malicious actions are to be prevented;
- player's account will be restricted from joining next game for certain period of time after previousl game is completed;
- player can use his other accounts to play.

SMART CONTRACT

- Rock Paper Scissors Smart Contract
CREATOR: Творець
MOVE_EXPIRED_CLAIM: ти ПЕРЕМІГ у грі та можеш отримати приз за протермінований опонентом хід
MOVE_EXPIRED_LOST: шкода, але ти не зробив хід вчасно і ПРОГРАВ у грі
ENTER_PREV_SEED_PHRASE: Будь-ласка введи секретну фразу попереднього ходу
ENTER_NEXT_SEED_PHRASE: Будь-ласка введи секретну фразу наступного ходу
ONLY_SINGLE_GAME: Дозволено приймати участь лище у одній грі. Ти вже граєш в гру з ID
JOIN_NEXT_GAME_IN: Зможеш долучитися до наступної гри через
SUSPENDED_DECRIPTION: Для уникнення спаму було введено період блокування активності користувача
RPS_PENDING_MOVE: Камінь Ножиці Папір: зроби наступний хід
RPS_GAME_JOINED_PENDING_MOVE: Камінь Ножиці Папір: до гри долучилися, зроби наступний хід
WON_ONGOING_GAME_OPPONENT_QUITTED: Вітання! Ти ПЕРЕМІГ у грі, опонент вийшов
WON_ONGOING_GAME_OPPONENT_EXPIRED: Вітання! Ти ПЕРЕМІГ у грі, час ходу опонента вийшов
LOST_ONGOING_GAME_YOU_QUITTED: Ой, ти ПРОГРАВ у грі вийшовши з неї
LOST_ONGOING_GAME_YOU_EXPIRED: Ой, ти ПРОГРАВ у грі, час твого ходу вийшов
ERR_WRONG_NETWORK: Неправильна мережа. Перекючися на Ethereum Main Network
ERR_LEGACY_BROWSERS: Застарілий браузер... Ми працюємо над підтримкою
ERR_NON_ETH_BROWSER: Ти користуєшся браузером, що не підтримує Ethereum. Використовуй MetaMask!
